properties.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Eastern/Central El Paso County; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southwest Desert/Mimbres Basin; Southern Tularosa Basin; Central Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley; Western El Paso County; Sierra County Lakes
properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 1:45PM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
A winter storm continues to produce snow across much of southern
New Mexico this afternoon especially for locations around
Deming...Truth or Consequences...White Sands Missile Range and
Hatch New Mexico.

In addition snow has begun to fall over the Las
Cruces New Mexico vicinity. Elsewhere a mixture of rain...small
hail...sleet and snow is falling around El Paso Texas and Santa
Teresa and Anthony New Mexico.

For southern New Mexico and west Texas the snow...sleet and rain
are expected through this afternoon and tonight. Snow amounts will
be around 1 to 3 inches for most of the area by sunrise
Wednesday. Thus dangerous driving conditions may exist including
across sections of Interstates 10 and 25.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM CONTINUES OVER SOUTHERN NEW MEXICO AND WEST TEXAS
